title: problems with the old client
body: it will not let me que up i have to invite one of my friends so that i can que up, alsoive had issues with the new client and i really need help plz

replies.body: it hgappens when i do a draft pick not blind pick

Draft pick requires a *super stable connection* because it has to sync so many actions with 10 players in the same visible lobby. Due to that fact, your issues are likely caused by fluctuations in your connection. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are configured properly for League.

Let me know if this caused any changes for you.
sorry i was not being smart and forgot to pick my roles
